doc_verify.title: Check your Document!
doc_verify.subtitle: type the code of the document to verify
type the code of the document to verify
doc_verify.app_download: Scanning your barcode with DocumenterApp is much easier and faster

features.title: What is Documenter?
features.ligne2: a system that ensures the authenticity of the documents you produce
features.ligne3: Allows you to check a document with a simple scan of its codebare or by typing its unique key
features.ligne4: An easy-to-use web and mobile application

about.ligne1: LetApp is an innovative startup which aims to democratize IT solutions for the benefit of small businesses, artisans and self-entrepreneurs
about.ligne2: LetApp uses the most efficient technologies and the most requested in the IT market

authentication.title: Authenticate with your Email and password
authentication.description: If you do not yet have an account, create one for free by clicking on the registration button.

dashboard.title: Consult your stats
dashboard.description: click on 'my folders' to consult the files which contain your documents.

newfolder.title: Click on the button at the top right to add a new folder
newfolder.description: enter the information of the new file and click on add.

documentslist.title: you will find here the list of documents that this file contains
documentslist.description: Some representative placeholder content for the third slide.

newdocument.title: Click on the button at the top right to add a new Document.
newdocument.description:
Enter the document information and the scanned images and click on save
              A unique code will be generated for this document and a barcode containing this code will be inserted on the scanned document.

codegeneration.title: communicate the generated code or print the document with the bar code for it to be used or scanned by your customers

documentdheck.title: The customer can thus consult the document and verify its authenticity.

register.title: Create New Account
register.subtitle: Documenter helps you protect the authenticity of your documents
